alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 3:24PM MDT until June 28 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southeastern Davis County in northern Utah... * Until 400 PM MDT * At 324 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salt Lake City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Bountiful, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful and Salt Lake City International Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 307 and 320. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 116 and 119. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
